message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $90. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll appreciate its value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I believe I can offer you $85 for the product. I hope this works for you!

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit to $88. This is still a fair price for both of us, considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think.
